examples.example: 办公室里的复印机每天都在高效地为大家服务着。

translate.english: The copying machine in the office serves everyone efficiently every day.

examples.example: 那台复印机快速地工作着，为我们的办公提供了很大的便利。

translate.english: That copier works rapidly, providing great convenience for our office work.

examples.example: 我们公司新买的复印机性能非常好，极大地提高了工作效率。

translate.english: The newly bought copier in our company has very good performance and greatly improves work efficiency.
